name: 2 Bullets 2 Nite
description:
Why was this game made?

This is my game jam entry for the United Game Jam 2020.

What is this game about?

This is a game about a Sheriff who was thrown back in time to fight dinosaurs, but he only has 2 bullets left in his barrel. Better make them count!

Luckily your pops showed you how to fashion bullets out of anything. I reckon' you could use scraps from those Dinos to make 2 more bullets.

Defeat the 14 waves of Dinos to return to your time machine to get back home safe!

Mechanics:

  • Shoot the Dinos to Defeat them
  • Don't get attacked by Dinos
  • Dinos get quicker as you Progress
  • If you die, you die
  • Earn points as you defeat the enemies
  • Step on Bullets after Dino is beat to get 2 more Bullets
    • Ammo will Despawn after X time

Who made this game? 

Art/Music/Sound/Dev/Design/CoffeeDrinker  - YanniMakes

Controls:

  • WASD (or Arrow Keys) - Moves the player
  • Space Bar - Fires a projectile to kill the Dinos
